scripts.start: gulp https # npm run build must have been done with enableMonitoring as false
scripts.start:monitor: gulp monitor # npm run build must have been done with enableMonitoring as true
scripts.test: gulp reportage-run # npm run build must have been done and npm run monitor must be running in another terminal
scripts.test:browser: gulp reportage-browser # npm run build must have been done and npm run monitor must be running in another terminal
